pages.text: An equal-exchange sigil for rapid block replacement. Select blocks you want to use, then swap connected blocks of the same type within a configurable radius.

pages.title: Selection Mode
pages.text: $(bold)Add Block:$() Sneak + Right-click a block$(br)$(bold)Clear Selection:$() Sneak + Right-click air$(br)$(bold)Max Selection:$() 20 different block types$(br2)Build your palette of replacement blocks. Only blocks you have in your inventory (survival) or selected (creative) will be used.

pages.title: Replacement Mode
pages.text: $(bold)Replace:$() Right-click a block$(br)$(bold)Radius:$() Scroll while sneaking to adjust (1-32)$(br)$(bold)LP Cost:$() Per block replaced (configurable)$(br2)Flood-fills connected blocks of the same type on the clicked face's plane, replacing them with random blocks from your selection.

pages.title: Features
pages.text: $(bold)Silk Touch:$() Replaced blocks drop as if mined with Silk Touch.$(br2)$(bold)Plane-Locked:$() Only replaces blocks on the same plane as the clicked face (floor, wall, or ceiling).$(br2)$(bold)Gradual:$() Replacements happen over time to reduce lag.$(br2)$(italic)Exchange is the foundation of all alchemy.$()
